text: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

translation.en: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses
translation.id: (Ingatlah) ketika suatu sore dipertunjukkan kepadanya (kuda-kuda) yang jinak, (tetapi) sangat cepat larinya
